scripts.prepublish: # Run BEFORE the package is packed and published, as well as on local npm install without any arguments.
scripts.prepare: # Run both BEFORE the package is packed and published, and on local npm install without any arguments (See below). This is run AFTER prepublish, but BEFORE prepublishOnly.
scripts.prepublishOnly: # Run BEFORE the package is prepared and packed, ONLY on npm publish.
scripts.prepack: # Run BEFORE a tarball is packed (on npm pack, npm publish, and when installing git dependencies).
scripts.postpack: # Run AFTER the tarball has been generated and moved to its final destination.
scripts.publish: # Run AFTER the package is published.
scripts.postpublish: # Run AFTER the package is published.
scripts.preinstall: # Run BEFORE the package is installed.
scripts.install: # Run AFTER the package is installed.
scripts.postinstall: # Run AFTER the package is installed.
